task.title: Process Reversing Entries
task.shortdesc: Reverse a payroll entry to remove wages containing an incorrect tax jurisdiction or tax category.

context.p: From the Summary tab, you can select which year to reverse the entry (current or previous year) and use the Pay Date Range selectors to limit your search.

The Reverse check box column enables you to select one or more documents to be reversed at the same time. The Details tab displays one check at a time with all associated check detail information for the selected document.

Reversing an entry for any employee payment, whether for a prior year or prior quarter, require an adjustment. Select Notify from the Manage Adjustments page after completing reversals and adjustments to alert Payment Services of a possible amendment.

note.p: Reversing a check without processing an adjusting entry for that reversal may result in negative earnings. Always review the information in the Confirm Reversal page before proceeding with the reversal action..

step.cmd: From the Reversing Entries page, select the year.
Select the appropriate pay date range to find the payment needed to reverse.
If needed, select the document number to be reversed to view the payment details.
Select the check box next to each document number to reverse.
Select Reverse. The Confirm Reversal window appears.
Select the quarter to post the reversals.

ul.li: Post all reversals to the quarter the original documents were posted
Post all reversals to the selected quarter

step.cmd: Select OK. The reversed entry posts directly to the payroll history tables.
